zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前比特币/美元（BTC/USD）价格在96867.03附近，呈现出震荡整理的趋势。过去24小时的价格变化仅为-0.11%，显示出市场的谨慎情绪。价格在高点97140.12和低点96211.99之间波动，反映出短期内缺乏明确的方向。投资者需关注市场情绪的变化，以判断未来走势。

从技术指标来看，虽然RSI未提供，但MACD显示出879.090757的相对强弱，表明市场可能处于强势区。短期内，SMA(20)在95569.82700附近提供了一个重要的支撑位，这意味着如果价格回调至该水平，可能会吸引买入兴趣。投资者需密切关注这一水平的表现，以判断买入时机。

支撑位方面，关键水平在96211.99，而阻力位则在97140.12。若价格突破97140.12，可能会引发进一步上涨，而跌破96211.99则可能使价格回落至更低水平。在当前市场环境中，建议投资者采取观望态度，等待价格突破关键阻力位后再考虑进场交易，以降低风险。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Bitcoin is currently trading at $96,867.03, showing a slight decline of 0.11% over the past 24 hours. The price has fluctuated between a high of $97,140.12 and a low of $96,211.99, indicating a relatively tight range. This consolidation phase suggests indecision among traders, with the market awaiting a catalyst for a breakout. The overall trend remains bullish, but the lack of significant movement could signal a potential reversal or a pause before the next upward push.

The absence of a 14-day RSI reading limits our ability to assess overbought or oversold conditions. However, the MACD at 879.09 indicates strong bullish momentum, suggesting that buyers remain in control. The SMA(20) at $95,569.83 further supports this view, as it serves as a dynamic support level. If the price holds above this moving average, it may attract additional buyers. A breach below this level, however, could lead to increased selling pressure and a reevaluation of the bullish trend.

Key support levels are identified around the recent low of $96,211.99, with further support at the SMA(20). Conversely, resistance is noted at the recent high of $97,140.12. A decisive break above this resistance may propel the price toward the psychological level of $100,000. Traders should closely monitor these levels, as they will dictate the short-term price action. 

For traders looking to enter positions, maintaining a buy strategy near support levels while setting tight stop-loss orders can mitigate risk. Conversely, those seeking to short Bitcoin might consider waiting for a confirmed breakdown below the SMA(20) to capitalize on potential downside movement. As the market landscape evolves, a disciplined approach will be essential for navigating the volatility inherent in cryptocurrency trading.
